laboratory_examinations.findings: Development of moderate right low-attenuation pleural effusion and increase in size of a moderate to large left pleural effusion. An 8-mm cystic lesion in the tail of the pancreas. Mild thickening and edema within the wall of the descending colon.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable mild thickening and edema within the wall of descending colon likely reactive in nature.
